method.name: GetView
method.comment: Returns the view at the given index. Supported types B4A - Activity, Panel B4i - Panel B4J - Pane

method.name: AddView
method.comment: Adds a view. Supported types B4A - Activity, Panel B4i - Panel B4J - Pane

method.name: SetRotationAnimated
method.comment: Rotates the view with animation. Duration - Animation duration in milliseconds. Degree - Rotation degree.

method.name: SetBitmap
method.comment: Sets the view's bitmap. Supported types: B4A - All views. The view's Drawable will be set to a BitmapDrawable with Gravity set to CENTER. B4i - ImageView. ContentMode set to Fit. B4J - ImageView. PreserveRatio is set to True.

method.name: SetTextAlignment
method.comment:
Sets the text alignment. Vertical - TOP, CENTER or BOTTOM. Horizontal - LEFT, CENTER or RIGHT.
In B4i the vertical alignment has no effect. Supported types: B4A - EditText, Label, Button, CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton B4J - Label, Button, Checkbox, RadioButton, ToggleButton

method.name: LoadLayout
method.comment: Loads the layout file. Supported types B4A - Panel B4i - Panel B4J - Pane

method.name: SetColorAnimated
method.comment: Changes the background color with a transition animation between the FromColor and the ToColor colors. Duration - Animation duration measured in milliseconds.

method.name: GetAllViewsRecursive
method.comment: Returns an iterator that iterates over all the child views including views that were added to other child views. Make sure to check the view type as it might return subviews as well. Example: For Each v As B4XView In Panel1.GetAllViewsRecursive ... Next Supported types B4A - Activity, Panel B4i - Panel B4J - Pane

method.name: RemoveViewFromParent
method.comment: Removes the view from its parent.

method.name: Snapshot
method.comment: Captures the views appearance.

method.name: BringToFront
method.comment: Changes the Z order of this view and brings it to the front.

method.name: SendToBack
method.comment: Changes the Z order of this view and sends it to the back.

method.name: RemoveAllViews
method.comment: Removes all views. Supported types B4A - Activity, Panel B4i - Panel B4J - Pane

method.name: SetColorAndBorder
method.comment: Sets the background color and border. B4A - The view's drawable will be set to ColorDrawable.

method.name: SetLayoutAnimated
method.comment: Sets the view size and position. Duration - Animation duration in milliseconds. Pass 0 to make the change immediately.

method.name: RequestFocus
method.comment: Requests focus to be set to this view. Returns True if the focus has shifted. Always returns True in B4J.

method.name: SetVisibleAnimated
method.comment: Fades in or fades out the view.

property.name: Left
property.comment: Gets or sets the left position.

property.name: Parent
property.comment: Returns the parent. The object returned will be uninitialized if there is no parent.

property.name: NumberOfViews
property.comment: Returns the number of direct child views. Supported types B4A - Activity, Panel B4i - Panel B4J - Pane

property.name: Font
property.comment: Gets or sets the font (typeface and text size). Supported types: B4A - EditText, Label, Button, CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton B4i - TextField, TextView, Button, Label B4J - Sets the Font property if available. Otherwise sets the CSS attribute.

property.name: Visible
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the view is visible.

property.name: Height
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's height.

property.name: TextColor
property.comment: Gets or sets the text colors. Supported types: B4A - EditText, Label, Button, CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton B4i - TextField, TextView, Label B4J - All types. Based on the native TextColor property if available or -fx-text-fill CSS attribute.

property.name: Width
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's width.

property.name: Progress
property.comment: Gets or sets the progress value. The progress value is scaled between 0 to 100 (this is different than the native views range in B4J and B4i). Supported types: B4A - ProgressBar B4J - ProgressView, ProgressIndicator B4i - ProgressView Value should be between 0 to 100.

property.name: ScrollViewContentWidth
property.comment: Gets or set the scroll view inner panel width. Supported types: B4A - HorizontalScrollView, ScrollView B4i - ScrollView B4J - ScrollPane

property.name: ScrollViewInnerPanel
property.comment: Gets or sets the scroll view inner panel. Supported types: B4A - HorizontalScrollView, ScrollView B4i - ScrollView B4J - ScrollPane

property.name: Color
property.comment: Gets or sets the background color. Returns 0 if the color is not available.

property.name: Enabled
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the view is enabled. Does nothing if the view does not support this property.

property.name: TextSize
property.comment: Gets or sets the text size. Supported types: B4A - EditText, Label, Button, CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton B4i - TextField, TextView, Button, Label B4J - Returns the TextSize property if available and the CSS attribute for other types. Returns 0 if attribute not available.

property.name: Text
property.comment: Gets or sets the text. Supported types: B4A - EditText, Label, Button, CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton B4i - TextField, TextView, Button, Label B4J - TextField, TextArea, Label, Button, CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton

property.name: Rotation
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's rotation transformation (in degrees).

property.name: Checked
property.comment: Gets or sets the checked state (also named selected or value). Supported types: B4A - CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton, Switch B4i - Switch B4J: CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton.

property.name: ScrollViewContentHeight
property.comment: Gets or set the scroll view inner panel height. Supported types: B4A - HorizontalScrollView, ScrollView B4i - ScrollView B4J - ScrollPane

property.name: ScrollViewOffsetX
property.comment: Gets or sets the horizontal scroll position. Supported types: B4A - HorizontalScrollView (returns 0 for ScrollView). B4i - ScrollView B4J - ScrollPane

property.name: Top
property.comment: Gets or sets the top position.

property.name: ScrollViewOffsetY
property.comment: Gets or sets the vertical scroll position. Supported types: B4A - ScrollView (returns 0 for HorizontalScrollView). B4i - ScrollView B4J - ScrollPane

property.name: Tag
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's tag object.

class.name: anywheresoftware.b4a.objects.B4XViewWrapper.B4XBitmapWrapper

method.name: Crop
method.comment: Returns a new cropped bitmap.

method.name: Rotate
method.comment: Returns a new rotated bitmap. The bitmap will be rotated clockwise. The following values are supported on all three platforms: 0, 90, 180, 270.

method.name: Resize
method.comment: Returns a new bitmap with the given width and height.

method.name: WriteToStream
method.comment: Writes the bitmap to the output stream. Quality - Value between 0 (smaller size, lower quality) to 100 (larger size, higher quality), which is a hint for the compressor for the required quality. Format - JPEG or PNG. Example: Dim Out As OutputStream Out = File.OpenOutput(XUI.DefaultFolder, "Test.png", False) Bitmap1.WriteToStream(out, 100, "PNG") Out.Close

property.name: Height
property.comment: Returns the bitmap's height.

property.name: Width
property.comment: Returns the bitmap's width.

class.comment: Represents a loaded image. Similar to B4A Bitmap, B4i Bitmap and B4J Image.

class.name: anywheresoftware.b4a.objects.B4XViewWrapper.B4XFont

method.name: ToNativeFont
method.comment: Returns a native font object representing the same font.

class.comment: An object that holds a typeface and size.

class.name: anywheresoftware.b4a.objects.B4XViewWrapper.XUI

method.name: Msgbox2Async
method.comment: Shows a non-modal Msgbox. Returns an object that can be used as the sender filter parameter for the Msgbox_Result event. Message - Dialog message. Title - Dialog title. Positive - Positive button text. Pass an empty string to remove button. Cancel - Cancel button text. Pass an empty string to remove button. Negative - Negative button text. Pass an empty string to remove button. Icon - Dialog icon. Pass Null to remove. Does nothing in B4i. Example: Dim sf As Object = xui.Msgbox2Async("Delete file?", "Title", "Yes", "Cancel", "No", Null) Wait For (sf) Msgbox_Result (Result As Int) If Result = xui.DialogResponse_Positive Then Log("Deleted!!!") End If

method.name: LoadBitmapResize
method.comment: Loads and resizes a bitmap.

method.name: PaintOrColorToColor
method.comment: B4A, B4i - Does nothing. B4J - Converts a Paint object to an Int color. Does not do anything if the color is already an Int color.

method.name: CreateFont
method.comment: Creates a new B4XFont from the given font and size. Do NOT use DIP units with font sizes.

method.name: CreateDefaultFont
method.comment: Create a new B4XFont with the default typeface. Do NOT use DIP units with font sizes.

method.name: CreateDefaultBoldFont
method.comment: Create a new B4XFont with the default bold typeface. Do NOT use DIP units with font sizes.

method.name: CreatePanel
method.comment: Creates a Panel (or Pane in B4J). Note that the panel created will clip its child views. In B4A, this method can only be called from an Activity context.

method.name: LoadBitmap
method.comment: Loads a bitmap. In most cases you should use LoadBitmapResize instead.

method.name: Color_ARGB
method.comment: Returns the color value from the components. Values should be between 0 to 255.

method.name: FileUri
method.comment: Returns a file uri. This can be used with WebView to access local resources. The FileName parameter will be url encoded. Example: WebView1.LoadHtml($""$) 'or: WebView1.LoadUrl($"${xui.FileUri(File.DirAssets, "smiley.png")}"$)

method.name: SetDataFolder
method.comment: B4A, B4i - Does nothing. B4J - Sets the subfolder name on Windows. The actual path will be similar to: C:\Users\[user name]\AppData\Roaming\[AppName]. Does nothing on other platforms.

method.name: MsgboxAsync
method.comment: Shows a non-modal Msgbox. Returns an object that can be used as the sender filter parameter for the optional Msgbox_Result event. Example:xui.MsgboxAsync("Hello", "World")

method.name: Color_RGB
method.comment: Returns the color value from the components. Values should be between 0 to 255.

method.name: SubExists
method.comment: Same as SubExists keyword. Adds an additional parameter that is required in B4i (number of parameters).

method.name: CreateFont2
method.comment: Create a new B4XFont from the given B4XFont and size. Do NOT use DIP units with font sizes.

property.name: IsB4i
property.comment: Returns True in B4i.

property.name: IsB4J
property.comment: Returns True in B4J.

property.name: IsB4A
property.comment: Returns True in B4A.

property.name: DefaultFolder
property.comment: B4A - Same as File.DirInternal. B4i - Same as File.DirDocuments. B4J - Same as File.DirData. You must first call SetDataFolder once before you can use this folder.

class.comment: The XUI object includes various methods and utilities.

method.name: DrawText
method.comment: Draws the text. Text - The text that will be drawn. x - The origin X coordinate. y - The origin Y coordinate. Font - The text font. Color - Drawing color. Alignment - Sets the alignment relative to the origin. One of the following values: LEFT, CENTER, RIGHT.

method.name: ClearRect
method.comment: Clears the given rectangle. Does not work in B4J with clipped paths.

method.name: DrawBitmap
method.comment: Draws a bitmap in the given destination. Use B4XBitmap.Crop to draw part of a bitmap.

method.name: Resize
method.comment: Resizes the canvas.

method.name: DrawTextRotated
method.comment: Similar to DrawText. Rotates the text before it is drawn.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the canvas. In B4A and B4i the canvas will draw on the passed view. In B4J the canvas which is a view by itself is added to the passed pane as the first element.

method.name: DrawCircle
method.comment: Draws a circle.

method.name: RemoveClip
method.comment: Removes a previously set clip region.

method.name: CreateBitmap
method.comment: Returns a copy of the canvas bitmap. In B4A it returns the canvas bitmap itself (not a copy).

method.name: DrawBitmapRotated
method.comment: Similar to DrawBitmap. Draws a rotated bitmap.

method.name: DrawLine
method.comment: Draws a line between x1,y1 to x2,y2.

method.name: DrawRect
method.comment: Draws a rectangle.

method.name: Invalidate
method.comment: Commits the drawings. Must be called for the drawings to be updated.

method.name: ClipPath
method.comment: Clips the drawings to a closed path.

method.name: Release
method.comment: Releases native resources related to the canvas. Does nothing in B4A and B4J.

property.name: TargetRect
property.comment: Returns a B4XRect with the same dimensions as the target view.

property.name: TargetView
property.comment: Returns the target view.

property.name: Height
property.comment: Gets or sets the rectangle height.

property.name: CenterY
property.comment: Returns the vertical center.

property.name: CenterX
property.comment: Returns the horizontal center.

property.name: Width
property.comment: Gets or sets the rectangle width.

method.name: LineTo
method.comment: Adds a line from the last point to the specified point.

method.name: InitializeRoundedRect
method.comment: Initializes the path and sets the current path shape to a rectangle with rounded corners. Rect - Rectangle. CornersRadius - Corners radius.

method.name: InitializeOval
method.comment: Initializes the path and sets the current path shape to an oval. Rect - The oval framing rectangle.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the path and sets the value of the first point.

method.name: InitializeArc
method.comment: Initializes the path and sets the current path shape to an arc. x / y - Arc center. Radius - Arc radius. StartingAngle - The starting angle. 0 equals to hour 3. SweepAngle - Sweep angle. Positive = clockwise.
